data.title: Comarch on LinkedIn: #comarch #benelux #comarch
data.meta_description:
🏆 Last week #Comarch was honored with the BEPOLUX award of ⭐ Best Polish Company in Luxembourg!
This accolade serves as a testimony of commitment to the…
data.text:
Meet Comarch Benelux📍Employing around 30 talented professionals, Comarch's Belgian branch has been constantly striving to provide innovative IT solutions to customers in various industries continuously since 2005. We are the largest Polish investor in Belgium. 👉 Strategic location: Brussels, Rotterdam, Luxembourg 👉 Multicultural team: the Comarch branch in Belgium is a team of professionals from different corners of the world. 👉 Expertise in key areas: the Belgian branch specializes in developing advanced ERP systems, e-health solutions and Smart Cities. 👉 Local commitment: We actively support local initiatives and social projects, committing to sustainability and environmental protection. Comarch Benelux is an official sponsor of one of the top soccer teams in the Belgian league - Royale Union Saint-Gilloise 👉 Innovative projects: Our Belgian experts are working on cutting-edge technologies, including IoT and Big Data solutions, to help our clients gain a competitive edge in a rapidly changing market. Stay up to date on our activities and projects underway in Belgium and around the world https://lnkd.in/drj_UVg #comarchbelgium #innovation #IT #sustainableDevelopment #comarchteam #multiculturalism Andrzej Przewiezlikowski Wojciech Pawlus Alexandra Ptchelintseva

🎉 Cracovia unveils their new kit for the 2024/2025 season! 🎉 The new jerseys highlight KS Cracovia SA's history, community, and regional pride, uniting fans and players. For this season, Cracovia has prepared three colour combinations. Each of them features the #Comarch logo: 🏠 Home kit: Celebrating 118 years of tradition, the classic red and white stripes are paired with an updated logo, symbolizing the club's rich heritage. 🚗 Away Kit: Inspired by industrial aesthetics and loyal fans, this black kit features subtle mosaic patterns reflecting local culture and unity. ⛰️ Mountains Kit: Embracing the mountainous spirit of malopolska, this blue and white design showcases the stunning Tatra Mountains and the region's pride. The outfits are now available in the official Cracovia shop. Get yours today! ⚽🔴⚪ 🔗 More info: https://lnkd.in/gE2JuNKg #Cracovia #NewSeason #FootballFashion #Tradition #Innovation #Fans #Comarch

We are thrilled to announce that Comarch has been accredited as a Peppol Service Provider by the Malaysia Digital Economy Corporation (MDEC). 🎉 This accreditation allows us to offer top-notch #Peppol #einvoicing solutions to businesses in Malaysia, ensuring compliance with the upcoming e-invoicing regulations.🏆 ✅ Comarch offers a comprehensive e-invoicing solution that streamlines and automates the entire invoicing process for businesses of all sizes. 🔗 Learn more about this accreditation: https://lnkd.in/d-cz3Frr #eInvoicing #Comarch #Peppol #DigitalTransformation #Malaysia #Compliance #BusinessSolutions Comarch Data Exchange

Last month we had the pleasure of welcoming our partners to Kraków for the Comarch User Group 2024. 🚀 This year's event was record-breaking, with engaging discussions and insightful presentations led by our guests. Let's relive these moments by watching the video recap, which captures the essence of our flagship event. Thank you to all our guests and those involved in making this year's edition a success, and see you at #CUG2025! 👋 #Comarch #CUG2024 #ComarchUserGroup

Once again, we took part in the Team Project Conference organised by the Wroclaw University of Science and Technology. We are proud that the project of a computer-aided electronic targeting system, created by students together with the help of our specialists, won 2nd place. Almost 100 projects were submitted in this year's edition, including 6 created together with us, such as the eye tracking system and usability analysis of a self-service application or Artificial Scrum Master. As a company, we were gold sponsors of the event, supporting young talent and innovative solutions. Congratulations to all the teams! 🏅👏💡 Mateusz Żurawski Mateusz Masłoń Piotr Lesnikowski Maciej Dzimira Marta Fiedorowicz #Innowacje #KonferencjaProjektówZespołowych #PolitechnikaWrocławska #Comarch

📢 Exciting News! We are thrilled to announce that Comarch Telecommunications has become a technology partner of the Bridge Alliance, a global network of leading telecom operators. This strategic partnership enables us to explore new collaboration and innovation opportunities, leveraging our expertise to drive growth and innovation in areas like 5G, IoT, and CPaaS. We look forward to working with Bridge Alliance's extensive network to bring cutting-edge solutions and create sustainable value for businesses and consumers worldwide. 🌐 🔗Learn more about this partnership: https://lnkd.in/d3859peb #Comarch #BridgeAlliance #TechnologyPartner #Telecom #5G #IoT

🏆 Great news! We are proud to share that alongside our partners Grupa EFL (Europejski Fundusz Leasingowy SA), Credit Agricole Bank Polska S.A., #Comarch have been honored as Regional Winner for Europe at the IBS Intelligence #DigitalBanking Awards 2024. Our innovative platform delivers an unparalleled customer experience, seamlessly integrating banking, leasing, and value-added services into one cohesive ecosystem. A huge thank you to our dedicated teams and loyal customers for believing in and supporting our vision! #AwardWinners #DigitalBanking #Innovation #CustomerExperience Comarch Financial Services

We are thrilled to announce a major milestone in the partnership between Royale Union Saint-Gilloise SCRL and Comarch! 🤝⚽ Building on our successful two-year collaboration, Comarch is now the main sponsor featured on Union's training kits for the 2024/2025 season. This significant development underscores the deepening relationship between our organizations and our shared vision for the future. 🥅 Union, one of Belgium's oldest and most successful football clubs, continues to build on its rich legacy with this new partnership milestone. With this enhanced sponsorship, the club is poised for even greater achievements in the upcoming season. 💬 "We are proud to extend our cooperation as an official sponsor for next year," said Wojciech Pawlus, Vice-President, Board Member at Comarch SA. "We share similar values and are excited to observe Union growing as a successful football challenger on the European scene, similarly to Comarch in IT software." Victor Pensis, Commercial Director of RUSG, expressed his enthusiasm about the strengthened partnership: "We are delighted to announce the extension of our partnership with Comarch. Their continued support is a sign of trust and a fruitful collaboration. Comarch shares our vision of innovation and excellence, and together we will continue to deliver unforgettable experiences to our supporters while strengthening our position in Belgian football." 💬 #RUSG #Comarch #Partnership #Football #Innovation #BelgianFootball Comarch Benelux
